content.description:
Ascend the shallow diagonal corner to the left of the crack. Eliminates are possibleâ€”off route big holds or use only small edges for the feet. Some fun movement up the corner takes you to jugs on the top. Get on top and hold your elders tight!

There is some lichen on hand/foot spots, but as this gets more traveled it will get better.
content.protection: A pad would be nice, but mental fortitude is better.
content.location: Start below the shallow diagonal corner to the left of the splitter crack.

content.description: Zig-zagging crack up the face, with the occasional foot holds. The whole negotiating the foot in the crack thing can be tricky. There are some spots for the feet on the face. Use your eyes and your creative brain.
content.protection: More of a boulder problem. There is a rocky landing so you may want a pad and spotter.
content.location: Center face, first line you'll see.
